channel.title: PI backround?
channel.description:
so i got my server up and running i just need to know how do i get my new backround i went to sprites and changed the picture but how do i save it so it will stay? please post
p.s there is no compiler in the folder

item.title: PI backround?
item.dc:creator: @sam81199 sam81199
item.description:
@sam81199 wrote:

there is a compiler in the folder but it looks like this i need to compile the PNG images but it wont work

@echo off
title Compile
cd Source
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\Bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin/ *.java
pause

and i did change the pic in the cache folder but it didnt work

Read full topic

item.title: PI backround?
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

Compile it. There does have to be a compiler in that folder. Just compile it over all. If that doesn’t work then just change the picture in the cache if it is in there.

Read full topic
